reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable with pockets and appreciate its flattering fit that hits just above the knee. Moreover, the dress is versatile, suitable for both dressing up and down, and features a soft fabric that feels nice on the skin. Additionally, the dress receives positive feedback for its quality, with one customer noting it looks expensive. However, opinions about the length are mixed, with some finding it nice while others say it's shorter than pictured. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress
items.body: I LOVE this dress. It fit me perfectly. It hangs just right. It is soft and so comfortable. I love how it doesn't wrinkle nor does it cling. It flows nicely. I could wear it all day long and feel great. It is so cute, and I love the pockets. When I need another new dress (of whenever I just want another one), I will definitely buy another one of these. Read more
items.author: Alice Jensen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite
items.body: Comfortable, fits perfectly wear with leggings and love the look. Pattern is complimentary, color is nice well made. Everyday wear and able to semi dressy Read more
items.author: PAPO

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and cute but smells like perfume
items.body: Iâ€™d been looking for a cute, cozy dress for chilly winter days, not having the best luck with it but am pleasantly surprised by this dress. Got the Dark Gray color, size L. The fabric feels nice, like a comfy t-shirt. For a minute I thought it might actually be made of cotton, but the tag confirms â€œ95% Polyester 5% Spandexâ€. I would not say the fabric is thick but itâ€™s not thin and see-thru either. Iâ€™d like it to be a little thicker, but itâ€™s not bad. Itâ€™s got a good stretch. The sleeves are the perfect length on me. The neckline opening is not so low that I feel exposed and cold up top. Iâ€™m 5â€™7 and the hem length falls right at the bottom of my knees. The bodice seam is pretty much in line with the bottom of my bra, which is exactly where I hoped it would be. (In the main listing photo the bodice seam appears to be lower.) All in all, I find the fabric to be of decent quality, and the style and color to be nice looking and comfy. Itâ€™s a good dress for layering. I havenâ€™t worn it outside yet, but I tried it on with some super cozy fleece lined tights (also bought on Amazon), a crocheted scarf and a light jacket and felt very comfy in my 60Â° house. I would have liked to wear it today, were it not for one thing: Before I even opened the plastic bag it was packaged in, I could smell a very strong perfume on it. Itâ€™s the type of perfume scent that laundry detergent, dryer sheets or air fresheners have. The dress was folded and packaged nicely but I wonder if all the dresses smell like that or did someone previously wear it and wash it? Being sensitive to perfumes, it gave me a headache almost immediately so I hung it up by itself to air out. The scent is still really strong after about 8 hours of airing. Iâ€™ll probably have to wash it before wearing. Read more
items.author: AmazonWoman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Iâ€™ve thought nearly all they offer. FAV dress with POCKETS
items.body: I LOVE this dress. Iâ€™ve now bought navy, maroon, burnt orange, purple, green, brown and black with flowers. What started as a dress to do Christmas photos in turned into a repeat dress the next year in a different color and this year Iâ€™ve bought several since we moved to a cooler area. I dress it up, and itâ€™s still casual enough. It fits well and is a thin but not see through stretchy cotton WITH POCKETS. Itâ€™s flattering on my mom-bod. Iâ€™m 5â€™6â€ and 240lbs and got a 2xl. Itâ€™s smooth and fitted across the bust but flows and comfy everywhere else. Read more
items.author: L & C Powell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft & Flattering
items.body: Just tried it on and it's so soft and fits nicely. The arms "fit like a glove" and are kind of comforting. The style is flattering for my frame. I usually purchase a large but the bra size said XL so I went with that. Fits good. The fabric is not real heavy but is not see through. I would purchase this as a gift or again in a different color. This will look great with boots! Got a dark gray and itâ€™s very charcoal Read more
items.author: OliveOilTan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous but material tooo cheap
items.body: I love this dress! I love the length, the sleeves, the POCKETS, neckline. It's a great solid dress to dress up or down. Cons: â€¢ My search was for cotton, I think the description even said this was cotton, but I'm not postive. It's not. It's 95% polyester. ðŸ¥µ Combined with the tight long sleeves...ðŸ¥µ The fabric is thin, though. â€¢ The bodice was getting a rough texture/kind of pilling the first day. It hasn't been washed yet and is looking like I've owned and washed it a year. ðŸ˜¥ It was $15, so I'm not out a bunch; but honestly, even though it's warm, I would have bought another because it's so comfy/easy to wear. With the rough texture right out the gate...nah... Read more
items.author: Cinaman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars At 5'4'', waist hits lower than empire waist
items.body: I'm 5'4'' so the waist drops down to my actual waist and doesn't fit as an empire waist dress. The hem falls about four inches past my knees as well. But I still like the fit! I washed in cold and hung to dry before I wore it. The wash didn't seem to change the shape or fit of the dress at all so that was great. Noticed no pilling. It's super soft and stretchy and the pockets are deep and functional. I held my phone, earpods, a lighter, and a vape pen in them and there was no bulk or noticeable weight pulling my pockets down. This worked well on a cold day paired with leggings. Could be layered. Could be worn between cold and warm seasons as well. I'm ordering another one :) Read more
items.author: MoniquePitts

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Donâ€™t buy this! Itâ€™s like itâ€™s a seconds dress from the sewing room trash
items.body: If I could give it a zero I would! I am a true medium this dress in the back is cut like itâ€™s for a child. The back is so hiked up I donâ€™t have problems with clothes like this ever! I was going to wear it to church tomorrow with boots and leggings but itâ€™s a joke! What a waste of money!!! I always take out the tape measure I have one in my beside table drawer and my husband is the measurer I go right by the chart! Itâ€™s the back section to the neck itâ€™s so short it jacks up the whole dress! Donâ€™t buy this itâ€™s trash! Sadly this is my favorite plaid to wear around the holidays! My granny taught industrial sewing we all were taught all machines and quality as well itâ€™s like this dress came from a seconds sweat shop! Read more
items.author: Tonya Foster

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dbl Red Plaid, Gray, Flower Wine Red, Olive Green, Flower Rose Black, Army Green, Black and White, Black, White Flower Black, Dark Gray, Navy Blue, Black and Green, Dark Green, Brown 02. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
